divs: Sighting DetailsStarting on Sunday May 13th, 2007, when I was lying in bed at 10:00pm (CST), I noticed a light in the North-East sky which would move quickly in small circles, fading and returning, and sometimes darting a short distance away and returning. I saw this nightly, once until 2:00am. It seemed slightly oval, even though it was small - yet larger than any surrounding star. Last night I watched it again even though it was cloudy. I have been puzzled by it's movement and that it returns, so decided to report and inquire about it.
Summary: Star-like object moving quickly in small circles, fades and returns, also darts.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Grand Rapids
There were no other sightings in Grand Rapids on or around May 13th 2007
